docs.summary: Use the Forum API to manage your site's member forum

permissions.name: Read Forums
permissions.description: Request permission to read all Wix Forum posts and category data.

params.name: extraFields
params.doc: Array of extra category fields to be added in the response. `UNKNOWN` must not be passed.

docs.summary: Returns a single category by ID.

response:

permissions.name: Read Forums
permissions.description: Request permission to read all Wix Forum posts and category data.

params.name: sort
params.doc: Array of sort objects (e.g.,  [{ fieldName: rank, order: Order.ASC }] )

params.name: extraFields
params.doc: Array of extra category fields to be added in the response. `UNKNOWN` must not be passed.

docs.summary:
Returns a list of categories by [query](https://github.com/wix-private/platformization-guidelines/blob/master/Server/API-Query.md)

Paging
- limit: default - 10, min - 0, max - 100
- offset: default - 0, min - 0

Filterable fields:
- id
- parentId
- name
- rank
- headerTitle
- headerType
- headerDescription
- postCount
- postViewCount
- slug

Sortable fields:
- rank
- postCount
- postViewCount

permissions.name: Read Forums
permissions.description: Request permission to read all Wix Forum posts and category data.

params.name: sort
params.doc: Array of sort objects (e.g.,  [{ fieldName: createdDate, order: Order.ASC }] ).

params.name: extraFields
params.doc: Array of extra post fields to be added in the response.

docs.summary:
Returns a list of posts by [query](https://github.com/wix-private/platformization-guidelines/blob/master/Server/API-Query.md)

Paging
- limit: default - 10, min - 0, max - 100
- offset: default - 0, min - 0

Filterable fields:
- id
- categoryId
- ownerId
- title
- contentText
- bestAnswerCommentId
- pinned
- commentingEnabled
- commentCount
- likeCount
- viewCount
- createdDate
- editedDate
- lastActivityDate
- slug

Sortable fields:
- lastActivityDate
- createdDate
- commentCount
- viewCount
- likeCount
- pinned

members.doc: The base URL. For premium sites, this will be the domain. For free sites, this would be site URL (e.g mysite.wixsite.com/mysite)

members.name: path
members.doc: The path to that page - e.g /product-page/a-product

members.name: resolutions

members.name: format
members.doc: Video format for example, mp4, hls.

members.name: postCount
members.doc: Total number of posts in category.

members.name: postViewCount
members.doc: Total number of post views in category.

members.name: postTypes
members.doc:
List of post type that Category supports.
 Deprecated on '2021-08-03'.

members.name: categoryAccess
members.doc: Whether all site visitors and members (`PUBLIC`), all members (`MEMBERS_ONLY`), or only specific members and groups of members with roles, badges or paid subscriptions (`PRIVATE`) can access posts in category.

members.name: noMemberPosting
members.doc: Whether only admins and moderators can write posts in category.

members.name: groups
members.doc: Ids of groups which can access category if categoryAccess is PRIVATE.

members.name: commentInteraction
members.doc: Defines what interactions may be applied on the comment under the posts created in this category, vote or like.

members.name: categoryId
members.doc: Category ID the post is listed under.

members.name: contentText
members.doc: The post content in plain text.

members.name: lastActivityDate
members.doc: Date of latest activity on this post (e.g., date the latest comment was added to post).

members.name: bestAnswerCommentId
members.doc: ID of the best answer comment for this post (selected by forum admin or post owner).

members.name: pinned
members.doc: Whether the post is pinned. Places the post at the top of the post list.

members.name: closed
members.doc: Whether post is closed and commenting is disabled.

members.name: commentInteraction
members.doc: Defines what interactions may be applied on the comment under the post, vote or like.

members.name: postId
members.doc: ID of post comment was made on

members.name: replyCount
members.doc: Total number of comments made responding to this comment

members.name: lastActivityDate
members.doc: Date of latest activity on this comment (e.g., date the latest reply was added to comment)

members.name: paths
members.doc: The set of field mask paths.

members.name: extraFields
members.doc: Array of extra category fields to be added in the response. `UNKNOWN` must not be passed.

members.name: category
members.doc: Retrieved category for the provided category ID.

members.name: extraFields
members.doc: Array of extra category fields to be added in the response. `UNKNOWN` must not be passed.

members.name: sort
members.doc: Array of sort objects (e.g.,  [{ fieldName: rank, order: Order.ASC }] )

members.name: extraFields
members.doc: Array of extra category fields to be added in the response. `UNKNOWN` must not be passed.

members.name: limit
members.doc: The number of items to load.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

members.name: fieldName
members.doc:
Records can be sorted by:
rank 
postCount 
postViewCount

members.name: order
members.doc: Records can be sorted in ascending (default) or descending order.
